snippet: Gunmen killed about 15 people, including children, in an attack on a town in the Central African Republic near the border with Chad, a local official and aid workers said Friday.
abstract: Gunmen kill about 15 people, including children, in attack on town in Central African Republic near the border with Chad.
lead_paragraph: Gunmen killed about 15 people, including children, in an attack on a town in the Central African Republic near the border with Chad, a local official and aid workers said Friday.

headline.main: Central African Republic: Gunmen Kill at Least 15 in a Border Town
headline.print_headline: Central African Republic: Gunmen Kill at Least 15 in a Border Town
